channel.title: OrangeScape 317 - Final Release
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]OrangeScape 317[/size][/center] [center]A deltascape project. [center]Download Server + Client V1.10: http://uppit.com/2lx7chkvlthk/OrangeScape.zip[/center] [center]Download Server + Client V1.09: http://uppit.com/fz91185kyd29/OrangeScape_317.zip[/center] [center]Hello! My name is Dallas, and I was the owner of OrangeScape 317, and 474. OrangeScape went thru many stages... 1. Hamachi. 2. Online, 18/7 3. Server got coded. 4. Resets... 5. More and more coding. 6. Added of anti-DDoS. 7. VPS hosted, 24/7 server. 8. Domain bought. 9. More coding... 10. The end.
I've had fun with many people on OrangeScape... Memorys I will not forget. Now, I'm giving you the server, and client, for free, ... Isn't that a good deal? With this as your base, you can really spice some great things up in the RSPS world. Why not give it a go?[/center]
[center][u]Features:[/u] NO anti-leech! SYIpkpker protected. Great emotes. Grammar is perfect. 100% fight pits. 100% godwars. 100% wilderness. Good GFX. Perfect barrage. No lag, can handle many players! Great combat timing. Barrows added, but no portal... Easy to add! Staffzone portal. Members' items. Great ::commands! Great ECO! Trading dupe fixed %90 Server sided items, cheat clients don't work. Cheat engine protected. Spam protected. Max logins before server drops connection: 2 Null protected. Easy to code server, with tutorials. Comes with working download client. Just a good server... Really. [/center]
[center][u]Commands[/u][/center] [center]::people ::players ::duel ::ipban ::banuser ::ipmute ::mute ::jail ::hail ::magebank ::hideout ::yell ::prices ::shop ::resetdrops ::npcreset ::pnpc ::npc ::xteletome ::xteleto ::interface ::master ::pure ::update ::gfx ::combat There may be more...[/center]
[center][u]Some photos of OrangeScape:[/u][/center] [center] [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSWelcome.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSThieve.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSShops.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSMining.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSLogin.png[/img] Home: [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSHome2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSHome.png[/img] Godwars: [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSGodwars.png[/img] Fight pits: [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSFightPits.png[/img] The server running: [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/OSCMD.png[/img] You can use this for the client photo: [IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j329/nzgamefreak/RSLoginScreen.png[/img]

item.title: OrangeScape 317 - Final Release
item.dc:creator: @NzGameFreak NzGameFreak
item.description:
@NzGameFreak wrote:

killthenoobscape:

To half ass fix the prayer icon go into the client and click on sprites and then delete SIDEICONS 5.jag and SIDEICONS 5.png. This will make the prayer icon normal but when you click on it it turns back into just a red stone. If anyone can tell me how to fix that I would be very happy. Nice server btw.

Not sure… Maybe find the prayer icon in another cache? Well… To be honest, I don’t think many people will care about it.

Read full topic

item.title: OrangeScape 317 - Final Release
item.dc:creator: @killthenoobscape killthenoobscape
item.description:
@killthenoobscape wrote:

To half ass fix the prayer icon go into the client and click on sprites and then delete SIDEICONS 5.jag and SIDEICONS 5.png. This will make the prayer icon normal but when you click on it it turns back into just a red stone. If anyone can tell me how to fix that I would be very happy. Nice server btw.

item.title: OrangeScape 317 - Final Release
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You could of kind of improved this a little more, nevertheless, this isn’t that bad I suppose, sad to hear this is your final release.

Read full topic

item.title: OrangeScape 317 - Final Release
item.dc:creator: @NzGameFreak NzGameFreak
item.description:
@NzGameFreak wrote:

@Fridder
The login message was annoying I know, when I hosted it… But it’s easy to remove, it’s in client.java, if someone don’t like it they can remove…and the prayer icon IDK what happened but TBH I got the icons from the yanille cache … Easy to fix if someone wanted to fix I guess… But this is my final release.

Read full topic

item.title: OrangeScape 317 - Final Release
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Nice… You should fix that sprite for the prayer icon, remove it when a player logs in yelling “blah has logged in!” that means it’s unsuccessful, no successful servers have that… Otherwise, good job. Barbarian Village is a unique home.

Read full topic

item.title: OrangeScape 317 - Final Release
item.dc:creator: @NzGameFreak NzGameFreak
item.description:
@NzGameFreak wrote:

[center][size=36pt]OrangeScape 317[/size][/center]
[center]A deltascape project.
[center]Download Server + Client V1.10: http://uppit.com/2lx7chkvlthk/OrangeScape.zip[/center]
[center]Download Server + Client V1.09: http://uppit.com/fz91185kyd29/OrangeScape_317.zip[/center]
[center]Hello! My name is Dallas, and I was the owner of OrangeScape 317, and 474.
OrangeScape went thru many stages…

  1. Hamachi.
  2. Online, 18/7
  3. Server got coded.
  4. Resets…
  5. More and more coding.
  6. Added of anti-DDoS.
  7. VPS hosted, 24/7 server.
  8. Domain bought.
  9. More coding…
  10. The end.

I’ve had fun with many people on OrangeScape… Memorys I will not forget. Now, I’m giving you the server, and client, for free, … Isn’t that a good deal?
With this as your base, you can really spice some great things up in the RSPS world. Why not give it a go?[/center]

[center]Features:
NO anti-leech!
SYIpkpker protected.
Great emotes.
Grammar is perfect.
100% fight pits.
100% godwars.
100% wilderness.
Good GFX.
Perfect barrage.
No lag, can handle many players!
Great combat timing.
Barrows added, but no portal… Easy to add!
Staffzone portal.
Members’ items.
Great ::commands!
Great ECO!
Trading dupe fixed %90
Server sided items, cheat clients don’t work.
Cheat engine protected.
Spam protected.
Max logins before server drops connection: 2
Null protected.
Easy to code server, with tutorials.
Comes with working download client.
Just a good server… Really.
[/center]

[center]Commands[/center]
[center]::people
::players
::duel
::ipban
::banuser
::ipmute
::mute
::jail
::hail
::magebank
::hideout
::yell
::prices

::master
::pure
::update
::gfx
::combat
There may be more…[/center]
